alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 10:59PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Van Buren, Cleburne, northern Faulkner and northwestern White Counties through 1130 PM CST... At 1059 PM CST, amateur radio operators reported a strong thunderstorm over Greenbrier, or 11 miles north of Conway, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Amateur radio. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Heber Springs... Greenbrier... Greers Ferry... Wooster... Quitman... Guy... Pangburn... Rose Bud... Damascus... Enola... Twin Groves... Mount Vernon... Pickles Gap... Fairbanks... Springhill... Woolly Hollow State Park... Mallet Town... Holland... Letona... Barney... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County; White
